analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended in the present,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, the past time is not apprehended in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs /
translated: the future time is not apprehended in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus byang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus byang mi dmigs te /
translated: and the present time is not apprehended in sameness.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na /
translated: If even sameness is not apprehended in sameness,

original: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /🔽ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos / ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos /
translated: How could the past time be apprehended in suchness?🔽How could the future time be apprehended in suchness?

original: da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos /
translated: How could the present time be apprehended in suchness?

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /🔽so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs / so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, a foolish, ordinary person is not apprehended at the prior limit;🔽a foolish, ordinary person is not apprehended at the later limit;

original: so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
translated: a foolish, ordinary person is not apprehended in the present;

original: so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
translated: a foolish, ordinary person is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //🔽rab 'byor / @455a *//
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro // rab 'byor / @455a *//
translated: Because a sentient being is not apprehended.

original: gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, a śrāvaka is not apprehended at the prior limit;

original: nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: a śrāvaka is not apprehended at the later limit;

original: nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
analyzed: nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
translated: a śrāvaka is not apprehended in the present;

original: nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
analyzed: nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
translated: a śrāvaka is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a sentient being is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /🔽rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs / rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, a pratyekabuddha is not apprehended in the past,🔽a pratyekabuddha is not apprehended in the future,

original: rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
translated: a pratyekabuddha is not apprehended in the present,

original: rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
translated: and a pratyekabuddha is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because sentient beings are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
translated: a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the present,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
translated: and a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro // rab 'byor / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs /
translated: it is because sentient beings are not apprehended.🔽Moreover, Subhūti, a tathāgata is not apprehended in the past,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs /
translated: a tathāgata is not apprehended in the future,🔽and a tathāgata is not apprehended in the present.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs /
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the present.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because sentient beings are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems @455b dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems @455b dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of wisdom like that

original: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
analyzed: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
translated: train in the sameness of the three times and complete the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: “Subhūti, this is the bodhisattva great beings’ Great Vehicle called ‘the sameness of the three times.’

original: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te /
analyzed: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te /
translated: Standing in it, bodhisattva great beings surpass the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
translated: go forth to the knowledge of all aspects.”🔽“Subhūti, what is the bodhisattva great beings’ Great Vehicle called ‘the armor’?

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord!

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di /
translated: The Lord has well described this Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, this sameness of the three times,

original: legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ste /
analyzed: legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ste /
translated: which is good, which is wholesome.

original: bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo //
translated: Lord, past bodhisattva great beings, having trained in this Great Vehicle, have attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /
translated: future bodhisattva great beings, having trained in just this perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: will attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na /🔽dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @456a *//
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na / dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @456a *//
translated: In the worlds of the ten directions, which are innumerable and limitless,🔽there are bodhisattva great beings who are also innumerable and limitless.

original: po rnams mchis kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing /
analyzed: po rnams mchis kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing /
translated: They train in this very Great Vehicle

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: and attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni /
analyzed: de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni /
translated: for that reason, this equality of the three times

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o //
translated: is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: When this was said, the Blessed One said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to //
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to //
translated: The tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas of the past, future, and present have attained omniscience by training in this Great Vehicle.

original: brnyes so / brnyes par 'gyur ro ////🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: brnyes so / brnyes par 'gyur ro //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: They have attained it, they will attain it, and they are attaining it.

original: le'u bcu gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u bcu gcig pa'o ////
translated: This completes the eleventh chapter from the Transcendent Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines, called “The Training.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: The Transcendent Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po don bzhi pa //
analyzed: bam po don bzhi pa //
translated: Chapter Twelve: The Training

original: de nas byams gang gi bus /
analyzed: de nas byams gang gi bus /
translated: Then, the son of Mādrī,

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: addressed the Blessed One as follows:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni /
translated: this elder Subhūti

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis /
translated: has been appointed by the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsko ba mdzad pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsko ba mdzad pas /
translated: to expound the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so //
analyzed: 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so //
translated: I think that this is merely the teaching of the Great Vehicle.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti🔽said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //🔽bcom @456b ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom @456b ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: bdag gam / gcig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags grang /
analyzed: bdag gam / gcig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags grang /
translated: have I not contradicted the perfection of wisdom by teaching the Great Vehicle?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Lord said:

original: rab 'byor / de ltar gyur ba'ang med do /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar gyur ba'ang med do /
translated: “Subhūti, that has not happened.

original: rab 'byor / khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to //
analyzed: rab 'byor / khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to //
translated: Subhūti, you have taught the Great Vehicle in accordance with the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is because whatever wholesome dharmas there are,

original: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
translated: whether dharmas of the śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
translated: dharmas of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
translated: dharmas of the bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang /
translated: or dharmas of the buddhas,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do //
translated: They are included and contained within the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa /
translated: what are the wholesome dharmas of the wings of awakening that are included and contained within the perfection of wisdom?

original: de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags /
analyzed: de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags /
translated: What are those śrāvaka dharmas, pratyekabuddha dharmas, bodhisattva dharmas, and buddha dharmas?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: “They are as follows:

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of magical power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of awakening, and the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i @457a *//🔽snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i @457a *// snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions,🔽the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the six clairvoyances, the perfection of generosity, the perfection of good conduct,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of wisdom, the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang; don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang; dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang; don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang; dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the external and the emptiness of the internal, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities. He taught the applications of mindfulness, the correct exertions, the bases of supernatural powers,

original: dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa @457b dang; mngon par shes pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang /
analyzed: dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa @457b dang; mngon par shes pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang /
translated: the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, the path, the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the higher cognitions, the subjugating sense fields,

original: rgyas pa'i skye mched dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang; 'gog pa dang / lam dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: rgyas pa'i skye mched dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang; 'gog pa dang / lam dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
translated: the sense fields of the awakened, the serial absorptions, and suffering, origin, cessation, path, the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
translated: all the meditative absorptions, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion,

original: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste /
translated: the great love, the great compassion, the great joy, the great equanimity, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, the unequaled attributes, and the constant equanimity.

original: rab 'byor / de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang /
translated: Subhūti, these are the wholesome dharmas that are the aspects of awakening.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste /
translated: They are held to be included within and contained within the perfection of wisdom.

original: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang; sangs rgyas kyi chos so //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang; sangs rgyas kyi chos so //
translated: They are the dharmas of the śrāvakas, the dharmas of the pratyekabuddhas, the dharmas of the bodhisattvas, and the dharmas of the buddhas.

original: rab 'byor / de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang; brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang; brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, here the Great Vehicle, the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of generosity are all included within and contained within the perfection of wisdom.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin @458a *//🔽pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin @458a *// pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang /
translated: “What is the perfection of patience? What is the perfection of discipline? What is the perfection of generosity?🔽What is form? What is feeling? What is perception? What are volitional factors? What is consciousness? What is the eye? What is form?

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang /
translated: What is eye consciousness? What is eye contact? What is the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact? What is the ear? What is sound?

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang; sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang; sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: the ear consciousness, the ear contact, and the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact; the nose, smells,🔽the nose consciousness, the nose contact, and the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact; the tongue, tastes,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: the tongue consciousness, the tongue contact, and the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact; the body, tactile objects,🔽the body consciousness, the body contact, and the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact;

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / @458b yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / @458b yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: It is the feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of body, sensory contact, and the mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams gang yin pa dang / me'i khams gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams gang yin pa dang / me'i khams gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang /
translated: It is the earth element, the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang /
translated: It is ignorance, karmic formation, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources,

original: reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sred pa gang yin pa dang / len pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sred pa gang yin pa dang / len pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang /
translated: What is contact? What is feeling? What is craving? What is grasping? What is existence? What is birth? What is old age and death?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: What is the perfection of generosity? What is the perfection of moral discipline? What is the perfection of patience? What is the perfection of perseverance?

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: What is the perfection of concentration? What is the perfection of wisdom? What is inner emptiness? What is outer emptiness? What is inner and outer emptiness?

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang @459a *//
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang @459a *//
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,🔽the emptiness of non-dispersal,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: and the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang; ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang; ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa dang /
translated: the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang /
translated: the branches of awakening, the noble eightfold path, the noble truths, the meditative stabilities, the immeasurable aspirations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug gang yin pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang yin pa dang / rgyas pa'i skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang /🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa @459b dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug gang yin pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang yin pa dang / rgyas pa'i skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa @459b dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the formless absorptions, the six clairvoyances, the eight sense fields of overpowering, the ten entire-nobility concentrations, the eight deliverances,🔽the nine serial absorptions, suffering, origination, cessation, path, the emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /
translated: signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation, the meditative stabilization, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha, the desire realm,

original: gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /
translated: the form realm, the formless realm, virtuous phenomena, nonvirtuous phenomena, contaminated phenomena, uncontaminated phenomena,

original: 'jig rten pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /
translated: the worldly dharmas, the supramundane dharmas, the conditioned dharmas, the unconditioned dharmas, the Tathāgata, the Dharma taught by the Tathāgata,

original: 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de @460a *//🔽dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de @460a *// dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: the Vinaya, the dharma-dhātu, suchness, the very limit of reality, the inconceivable element, and the element of nirvāṇa—🔽all those dharmas

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te /
translated: are neither conjoined nor disjoined,

original: gzugs med pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa /
translated: are formless,

original: bstan du med pa /
analyzed: bstan du med pa /
translated: cannot be shown,

original: thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa /
translated: are unimpeded,

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste /
translated: and are the same in terms of having a single defining mark, which is no defining mark at all.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs 'dis na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs 'dis na /
translated: Subhūti, by this one of many explanations

original: khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston to //
analyzed: khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston to //
translated: you teach the Great Vehicle in accordance with the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: The Great Vehicle is not one thing

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: and the perfection of wisdom another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus the Great Vehicle and the perfection of wisdom are not two and cannot be made two.

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: The Great Vehicle is not one thing

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /

translated: and the truths are something else.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: Thus, the Great Vehicle and the noble truths are not two and are not divided.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: The Great Vehicle is not one thing and the concentrations another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / bsam gtan rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / bsam gtan rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: Thus, the Great Vehicle and the concentrations are not two and are not divided.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: The Great Vehicle is not one thing and the immeasurables another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / tshad med pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / tshad med pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: Thus, the Great Vehicle and the immeasurables are not two and are not divided.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: The Great Vehicle is not one thing and the formless absorptions another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the Great Vehicle and the formless absorptions are not two and are not divided.

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: the Great Vehicle is one thing,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: and the eight deliverances are another,

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: but it is not like that. The Great Vehicle and the eight deliverances are not two and not divided.

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: The Great Vehicle is one thing,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: and the nine serial absorptions are another,

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: but it is not like that. The Great Vehicle and the nine serial absorptions are not two and not divided.

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: The Great Vehicle is one thing,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: and the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation are another,

original: de ltar na theg pa chen @463a *//
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen @463a *//
translated: but it is not like that. The Great Vehicle and the three gates of liberation are not two and not divided.

original: po dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: po dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are not two and are not sundered.

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: “The Mahāyāna is not one thing,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: and the superknowledges another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the Mahāyāna and the superknowledges are not two and are not sundered.

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: “The Mahāyāna is not one thing,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: and the meditative stabilizations another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the Mahāyāna and the meditative stabilizations are not two and are not sundered.🔽“The Mahāyāna is not one thing,

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la; gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la; gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: and the dhāraṇī gateways another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the Mahāyāna and the dhāraṇī gateways are not two and are not sundered.

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /🔽de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de / de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: The Great Vehicle is not one thing, and the ten powers of the Tathāgata another.🔽Thus, the Great Vehicle and the ten powers of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /🔽mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /🔽de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de / de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: The Great Vehicle and the ten powers of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /🔽de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gnyis @463b su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de / de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gnyis @463b su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: The Great Vehicle and the four fearlessnesses are not two and cannot be made two.

original: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: The Great Vehicle and the four detailed and thorough knowledges are not two and cannot be made two.🔽The Great Vehicle and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not two and cannot be made two.

original: snying rje chen po'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: The Great Vehicle and great compassion are not two and cannot be made two.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la /
translated: Thus, the Great Vehicle and great compassion are not two nor divided.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: The Great Vehicle is not one thing and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha another.

original: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the Great Vehicle and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not two nor divided.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po bstan pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po bstan pas /
translated: Subhūti, for this reason, the teaching of the Great Vehicle

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: is the teaching of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: The teaching of the perfection of wisdom is the teaching of the Great Vehicle.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: in that way, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the prior limit.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su mi dmigs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su mi dmigs te /
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du /
analyzed: gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du /
translated: Because form is infinite,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: the bodhisattva should be known as infinite.

original: tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du /
analyzed: tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du /
translated: Because feeling is infinite,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: the bodhisattva should be known as infinite.

original: 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du /
analyzed: 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du /
translated: Because perception is infinite,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: the bodhisattva should be known as infinite.

original: 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du /🔽byang chub sems dpa' kun @464a *//
analyzed: 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du / byang chub sems dpa' kun @464a *//
translated: Because volitional factors are infinite,

original: tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: the bodhisattva should be known as infinite.

original: rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du /
translated: Because consciousness is infinite,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste /
translated: the bodhisattva should be known as infinite.

original: gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so //
translated: It is said, ‘Form is a bodhisattva,’ but that is not so, and it is not apprehended.

original: tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so //
translated: Feeling is not a bodhisattva, and so on up to

original: 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so //
translated: perception is not a bodhisattva, and so on up to

original: 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so //
translated: volitional factors are not a bodhisattva, and so on up to🔽consciousness is not a bodhisattva, and so on up to

original: rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs te /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is not a bodhisattva.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad /
translated: Blessed One,🔽in that way I do not see and do not observe any bodhisattva at all,

original: rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: anywhere, in any way.

original: ma dmigs na /
analyzed: ma dmigs na /
translated: Blessed One, if I do not see and do not observe any bodhisattva at all,

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi /
translated: in any way, then what bodhisattva should I advise and instruct in what perfection of wisdom?

original: byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na /
translated: If I do not see and do not observe even the very word bodhisattva,

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing bstan par bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing bstan par bgyi /
translated: “Bhagavān, what bodhisattva should be instructed in the perfection of wisdom?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas te /
translated: ‘bodhisattva’ is just a word.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi @464b ba'ang /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi @464b ba'ang /
translated: just as ‘self’ is said,

original: bdag la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bdag la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
translated: but there is no self to be found,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'ang /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'ang /
translated: in the same way ‘bodhisattva’ is said,

original: byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so //
translated: but there is no bodhisattva to be found.

original: de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la /
analyzed: de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la /
translated: In that way, in phenomena that are without intrinsic nature,

original: gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs lta'ang gang zhig mchis /🔽gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba lta'ang gang zhig mchis /
analyzed: gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs lta'ang gang zhig mchis / gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba lta'ang gang zhig mchis /
translated: what is there to be found in form that is to be found?🔽What is there to be found in feeling that is to be found?

original: gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du shes lta'ang gang zhig mchis /
analyzed: gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du shes lta'ang gang zhig mchis /
translated: What is there to be found in perception that is to be found?

original: gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du byed lta'ang gang zhig mchis /
analyzed: gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du byed lta'ang gang zhig mchis /
translated: What is there to be found in volitional factors that is to be found?

original: gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis /
analyzed: gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis /
translated: What is there of consciousness that is established?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags /
translated: that which is not established is not form.

original: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags /
translated: That which is not established is not feeling.

original: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags /
analyzed: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags /
translated: That which is not established is not perception.

original: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags /
analyzed: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags /
translated: That which is not established is not volitional factors.

original: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te /
analyzed: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te /
translated: That which is not established is not consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,🔽although it is like that,

original: de lta lags la mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang /
analyzed: de lta lags la mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang /
translated: apart from that which is not established,

original: gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis na /
analyzed: gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis na /
translated: a bodhisattva great being who would practice for awakening cannot be apprehended.

original: mngon par ma grub pa mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams su mchis sam /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams su mchis sam /
translated: So how could that which is not established give instructions to the perfection of wisdom that is not established?

original: gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: If, when taught like this,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum /
translated: the mind of a bodhisattva great being does not get discouraged,

original: yongs su mi 'jum /🔽@465a *// 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing yid mi 'jigs mi dngang /
analyzed: yongs su mi 'jum / @465a *// 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing yid mi 'jigs mi dngang /
translated: they will not be discouraged,

original: skrag par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: skrag par mi 'gyur na /
translated: they will not have regrets, and their minds will not be frightened, terrified, or become fearful.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
translated: If that is the case, then those bodhisattva great beings are practicing the perfection of wisdom.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /🔽ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor / ci'i phyir na /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmigs su med pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmigs su med pa yin /
translated: why is it that bodhisattva great beings are not apprehended in the past?

original: phyi ma'i mthar dmigs su med pa yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mthar dmigs su med pa yin /
translated: Why is it that they are not apprehended in the future?

original: dbus su dmigs su med pa yin /
analyzed: dbus su dmigs su med pa yin /
translated: Why is it that they are not apprehended in the present?

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /
translated: why is it that

original: gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir /

translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the past.

original: byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sems can med pa'i phyir /

translated: because sentient beings do not exist,

analyzed: sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because sentient beings are empty, because sentient beings are isolated, and because sentient beings are essentially nonexistent, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the middle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: why is that?

analyzed: sems can med pa dang / sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang @467a *//
translated: Because sentient beings are not apprehended in sentient beings, because sentient beings are empty, because sentient beings are isolated, and because sentient beings are natureless.

analyzed: bzhin med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: dbus su mi dmigs so // sems can med pa'ang gzhan /

original: sems can stong pa'ang gzhan /🔽sems can dben pa'ang gzhan /
analyzed: sems can stong pa'ang gzhan / sems can dben pa'ang gzhan /

analyzed: sems can rang bzhin med pa'ang gzhan zhig la /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste / sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan /
translated: Bodhisattvas are another,🔽and the past is another.🔽The future is another,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan /

original: dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: There is no such thing as ‘sentient beings are one thing,🔽and sentient beings are empty are another.🔽Sentient beings are isolated are another,🔽and sentient beings are natureless are another.🔽Bodhisattvas are another,🔽and the past is another.🔽The future is another,🔽and the present is another.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na sems can med pa gang yin pa dang / sems can stong pa gang yin pa dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na sems can med pa gang yin pa dang / sems can stong pa gang yin pa dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
translated: Thus, sentient beings being nonexistent, sentient beings being empty, sentient beings being void, sentient beings having no intrinsic nature, and bodhisattvas,

original: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: the prior limit, the later limit, and the middle—all of these are non-dual and indivisible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzugs med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phyir /
translated: because form does not exist,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the prior limit.🔽Because the emptiness of form,

analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the prior limit.

original: gzugs dben pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs dben pa'i phyir /
translated: Because form is void,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the prior limit.

original: gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because form is without an intrinsic nature, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past.

original: gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' @467b phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' @467b phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because form is non-existent, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.🔽Because form is empty, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because form is isolated, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because form is without an intrinsic nature, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //🔽gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so // gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because form is non-existent, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because form is empty, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because form is isolated, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because form is without an intrinsic nature, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzugs med pa dang / gzugs stong ba nyid dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: gzugs med pa dang / gzugs stong ba nyid dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the emptiness of physical forms, the seclusion of physical forms, and the nature of physical forms are not discerned in the past,

analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: they are not discerned in the future,

analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te / gzugs med pa'ang gzhan ma yin / gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and they are not discerned in the present.🔽Physical forms are not one thing, and emptiness another;

analyzed: gzugs dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin / sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The bodhisattva is not one thing,🔽the past is not another,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the future is not another,

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: and the present is not another.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na lus med pa gang yin pa dang / lus stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na lus med pa gang yin pa dang / lus stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
translated: Thus, the absence of a body, the emptiness of a body, the isolation of a body, the absence of an intrinsic nature of a body, the bodhisattvas, and the prior limit are not two, nor are they divided, nor do they have any divisions.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva and the past and future and middle periods are not two and are not divided.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽yid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽yid @475a *// stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / yid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // yid @475a *// stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past because of the nonexistence of mind.

original: yid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

original: yid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because form is essenceless, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past.

original: gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because form is nonexistent, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.🔽Because form is empty, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.🔽Because form is isolated, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' @476a *//🔽phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
